unnormalised: Hey everyone, any updates on Dhawan? Hope he recovers soon! Remember that ligament tear last week? Heard rumors about Bumrah's stress fracture too. Wishing them a speedy recovery like SRK in *Kal Ho Naa Ho* after all those obstacles! Heard Dr. Sharma from AIIMS is consulting. Get well soon, lads! It's crucial before the T20 World Cup! We need our star players on the field, especially after paying so many Rs. for tickets!
